arStrings.szText: "Is this the place? What are we looking for?"
Just give me one moment. I've only read how to do this in books until now. Hopefully, we can attune with the spirits in the area, like so...
Concentrating, but light-hearted, hopeful. He's performing a ritual he's only read about before.
Hopeful, anticipatory. He's just finished attempting to "attune" with the spirits.
Listen well. We are the Hand of Zakarum.
Stern. Projecting his voice to the people in his immediate vicinity.
The man known as Batzorig is suspected of heresy. Anyone with information as to his whereabouts, come forth at once!
Oh, excuse me! I'm not sure where he lives, but I see him with a neighbor of his quite often. And they live to the north, just over there.
Slightly timid but seeking approval. Here, she's selling out another town resident.
Ah, incredible! Did you see that? Come quick, we must follow their trail! To the north!
In awe of what they just witnessed and what he just accomplished. Then, excited, anticipatory.
